regen.new_specification: The system shall validate and confirm batch project updates before applying changes to ensure data integrity and accuracy.

regen.absent_element: situation of handling budget overruns or shortages
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert users when project budgets exceed allocated funding levels or fall below minimum required levels.

regen.absent_element: action to handle project budget overruns or deficits
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert the user when a project's budget exceeds its allocated funding level and provide options for reallocating funds or adjusting the project scope.

label: The system shall warn users if the project budget exceeds funding.
